metadata.title: CVE-2022-42856 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling. Thisissue is fixed in Safari 16.2, tvOS 16.2, macOS Ventura 13.1, iOS 15.7.2and iPadOS 15.7.2, iOS 16.1.2. Processing maliciously crafted web contentmay lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that thisissue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS releasedbefore iOS 15.1..

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
